name: Level of completion of SUMP measures
description: It is the share (%) of SUMP measures implemented within the SUM project in each LL.

name: Community Involvement
description: It is the number of participatory planning or public engagement activities that have been organized in each LL.

name: Balance of pull - push measures
description: It is defined as the ratio between planned or implemented pull measures over the planned or implemented push interventions in each LL.

name: planned over implemented
description: It is defined as the ratio between planned or implemented pull measures over the planned or implemented push interventions in each LL.

name: implemented over planned
description: It is defined as the ratio between implemented pull measures over the implemented push interventions in each LL.

name: Number of NSM integrated in the system
description: It is total number of NSMs that have already been integrated in the transport system of each LL.

name: Acceptance level of planned/implemented measures
description: It is the share (%) of respondents who accept the planned/implemented interventions in each LL

name: car-sharing
description: It is the share (%) of respondents who intend to use or continue using NSM

name: micro-mobility
description: It is the share (%) of respondents who intend to use or continue using NSM

name: ride-hailing
description: It is the share (%) of respondents who intend to use or continue using NSM

name: car-sharing only
description: It is the actual door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT (alternative  modes) over the actual door-to-door travel time using a private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: micro-mobility only
description: It is the actual door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: ride-hailing and shuttle services only
description: It is the actual door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: public Transport only
description: It is the actual door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: public transport and car-sharing
description: It is the actual door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: public transport and micro-mobility
description: It is the actual door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: public transport and ride-hailing or shuttle services
description: It is the actual door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: Active mobility infrastructure
description: It is the share (%) of road network length with bike lanes, traffic calming measures (30 km/h or less), or pedestrian zones in each LL over the total road network length

name: Multimodal integration in stations/stops
description: It is the average percentage (%) of available transport modes (NSM + PT) at mobility hubs in relation to the total number of transport modes operating in each LL.

name: public transport #1
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: public transport #2
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: public transport #3
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: car sharing #1
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: car sharing #2
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: micro-mobility #1
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: micro-mobility #2
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: micro-mobility #3
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: ride-hailing and shuttle services #1
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: ride-hailing and shuttle services #2
description: It is the mean travel cost of using NSM + PT over the mean travel cost of using private car in each LL.

name: taxi [off-peak]
description: It is the perceived door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over the perceived door-to-door travel time using a private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: public transport [off-peak]
description: It is the perceived door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over the perceived door-to-door travel time using a private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: bicycle [off - peak]
description: It is the perceived door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over the perceived door-to-door travel time using a private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: taxi [peak]
description: It is the perceived door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over the perceived door-to-door travel time using a private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: public transport [peak]
description: It is the perceived door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over the perceived door-to-door travel time using a private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: bicycle [peak]
description: It is the perceived door-to-door travel time using NSM + PT over the perceived door-to-door travel time using a private car at peak/off-peak hours in each LL.

name: diff taxi
description: It is the mean difference of perceived safety ratings for each NSM mode over the perceived safety ratings of private car in each LL.

name: diff public transport
description: It is the mean difference of perceived safety ratings for each NSM mode over the perceived safety ratings of private car in each LL.

name: diff personal bicycle
description: It is the mean difference of perceived safety ratings for each NSM mode over the perceived safety ratings of private car in each LL.

name: diff traffic taxi
description: It is the mean difference of perceived safety ratings for each NSM mode over the perceived safety ratings of private car in each LL.

name: diff public transport
description: It is the mean difference of perceived safety ratings for each NSM mode over the perceived safety ratings of private car in each LL.

name: diff bicycle
description: It is the mean difference of perceived safety ratings for each NSM mode over the perceived safety ratings of private car in each LL.

name: User satisfaction
description: It refers to the share (%) of satisfied users (rates 4, 5, and 6) by the provided NSM + PT services in each LL.

name: Perceived affordability
description: It is the perceived share (%) of the monthly household budget spent in travelling.

name: Greenhouse emissions
description: It is the tank-to-wheel and well-to-wheel CO2 emissions (in tons) of all passenger transport modes per inhabitant in each LL.

name: Air pollution emissions
description: well-to-wheel air pollutant emissions (in tons) of all passenger transport modes per inhabitant in each LL

name: Noise hindrance
description: the percentage of people exposed to different noise bands (i.e., 55–59, 60–64, 65–69, 70-74, > 75 dB) in each LL

name: Energy consumption ratio
description: The total energy consumption per km of only the passenger transport modes

name: Accessibility ratio
description: It is the accessibility provided by NSM and/or Public Transport over the accessibility private by private car

name: Horizontal social equity
description: It refers to the distribution of accessibility level among individuals, groups or geographic areas considered equal in capabilities and requirements.

name: Vertical social equity
description: It refers to the distribution of accessibility level among individuals, groups or geographic areas that differ in needs and abilities in each LL.

name: Social inclusion
description: It is the inclusion of Public Transport and/or NSM services to persons with reduced mobility.

name: Congestion and travel delays
description: It is the average ratio between of travel time at peak hours and off-peak hours considering all transport modes

name: Social welfare
description: It is defined as the total profits of passengers using NSM and Public Transport, expressed in time savings, plus the total profits of transport operators

name: Profitability of NSM operators
description: It is the annual change (%) in total profits of all NSMs that have been integrated in the transport system

name: Profitability of MaaS platforms
description: It is defined as the percentage change in total profits month-over-month

name: Operation revenue of NSMs
description: Revenue Per Month (€/Month) for NSM services per LL is a metric that represents the total income generated/ or/ predicted to be generated from the service within a month.

name: Service utilization rate
description: The proportion of operational vehicles within the entire fleet
